externalguidance-machine-translation-hea: Header label shown below the title for a page in a machine translation context
externalguidance-machine-translation-con: Label for contribute action for a page in a machine translation context
externalguidance-specialpage-mt-intro:
A brief explanation on why you cannot edit on a machine translated page.

$1 is Source wiki project name.
$2 is source language name.
$3 is target language name.
externalguidance-specialpage-mt-intro-pa:
A brief explanation on why you cannot edit on a machine-translated page.

$1 is the source wiki project name, such as "Wikipedia".

$2 is the source language name.
externalguidance-specialpage-mt-pageexis:
Message shown in the Special:ExternalGuidance page when the page already exist in target language. 

$1 is the language name.
externalguidance-specialpage-intro-machi: A short note on why machine translation can be bad.
externalguidance-specialpage-intro-human: A short note on why human translations are better.
externalguidance-specialpage-contribute-: Title for section that lists the ways to contribute.

A short note saying the article can be created.

$1 is target language name
Button label to create a new article.
A short note saying the user can expand the existing article.
Button label to expand the existing article.
A short note to indicate the source article can also be improved.

Button label for improving source article.

$1 is language name
externalguidance-machine-translation-pag:
Message shown when the page exist in target language. 

$1 is the URL for target language article. '''Do not change its position within the square brackets; this is [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Links#External_links MediaWiki external link syntax] and moving the URL will break the link.'''
externalguidance-specialpage-createpage-: Header text for the section showing different ways a user can create an article

Label for the radio button to choose translation as the method to create article. 
$1 is source language autonym, $2 is target language autonym
Label for the radio button to choose start-from-scratch option to create article.
externalguidance-machine-translation-pag: Message shown when the page is missing in target language. $1 - Target language autonym
externalguidance-machine-translation-pro: Title text for the overlay that shows the machine translation service information
Message stating that content is translated. $1 is the wiki project name, $2 is the MT service name.
Label for link that takes to the privacy terms of service provider
externalguidance-machine-translation-acc: Heading text for the section explaining how to access the original source. $1 is wiki project name

A brief note on how to access the original source article when that page does not exist yet.

* $1 is wiki project name, such as "Wikipedia".
* "View original" is a part of the Google Translate interface. It appears as the label "View:" and two buttons: "Translation" and "Original". See an example at https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=auto&u=https%3A%2F%2Fen.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FYehoshua_Bar-Hillel

A brief note on how to access the original source article when that page already exist.

* $1 is wiki project name, such as "Wikipedia".

* "View original" is a part of the Google Translate interface. It appears as the label "View:" and two buttons: "Translation" and "Original". See an example at https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=auto&u=https%3A%2F%2Fen.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FYehoshua_Bar-Hillel
externalguidance-machine-translation-con: Label for the link that takes the user to a special page that explains various ways to contribute
externalguidance-specialpage-createpage-: Title for the overlay that helps to choose the title for new page
Label for the button when the page exists already
A brief description on what happens if you click on button. $1 is project name
Error message shown when the entered title already exists.
externalguidance-specialpage-param-missi:
Error message shown when Special:ExternalGuidance is used without all four of the required parameters.
'''Do not translate the parameter names.'''
externalguidance-specialpage-invalid-lan: Error message shown when Special:ExternalGuidance is used with an invalid language code.
externalguidance-specialpage-invalid-ser: Error message shown when Special:ExternalGuidance is used with an invalid service name.
